name: Zero Code NFT
highlight: Drop Your NFT Collection With ZERO Coding Skills. Seamless solution to create a smart contract & minting page without giving up any royalties
summary: We offer an advanced no-code tool to simplify the smart contract development and deployment process, allowing you to launch your NFTs with no previous coding experience. Tools include: whitelist, delayed reveal, low gas smart contracts, airdrop, revenue splits, snapshots and more!
